tags.description: Receive a discount of 0.125% on the standard interest rate for a Home Equity Line of Credit (HELOC).
tags.conditions: Finance at least $5,000 in new solar energy equipment or have existing solar energy equipment installed.

tags.description: Promotes environmentally friendly initiatives related to solar energy.
tags.benefits: Lower interest rate on the HELOC and potential cost savings.

tags.detail: Now is the time to save on a Home Equity Line of Credit
tags.description: Urges individuals to take advantage of cost-saving opportunities for a HELOC.
tags.benefits: Reduced interest rates, no closing costs or origination fees, and flexible credit limits.

tags.detail: An additional 0.125% off with automatic payments
tags.description: Offers an extra discount on the interest rate for customers who set up automatic monthly payments.
tags.conditions: Requires a qualifying Bank of the West checking or savings account.

tags.detail: CALL FOR A CUSTOMIZED RATE QUOTE TODAY 1-855-296-5848 (TTY 1-800-659-5495) or visit BankoftheWest.com/Solar
tags.description: Encourages potential customers to contact the bank for personalized rate quotes.

tags.detail: Bank of the West, BMO Harris Bank N.A.
tags.description: Mentions the banking institutions involved in offering the HELOC.
tags.details: Trade names, approval process, and branding requirements.

tags.description: Provides information about the product's terms and fees.
tags.details: Credit qualifications, collateral valuation, fees, and restrictions.

tags.detail: Evidence of adequate property insurance required
tags.description: Highlights the requirement for adequate property insurance.
tags.conditions: Proof of insurance coverage is necessary to qualify for the HELOC.

tags.description: Explains the structure of the HELOC with variable rate draw and fixed-rate repayment periods.
tags.details: Monthly interest-only payments during the draw period, followed by a fully-amortizing repayment period.

tags.description: Provides information about the APR, fees, and state law limitations.
tags.details: APR based on the Prime Rate, margins, state law limitations, annual fees, and potential additional fees.
